title: Concerning Ping issues
body: Hello! I had some ping problems in a game I was playing. It got so bad that it actually got 500 ping (I usually score somewhere around 80-85). I checked my other applications to see if they were having ping problems but they were all doing normal and fine. Help please?

replies.body:
It sounds like there could be something wrong in your route to the server. Latency (ping) issues usually happen due to ISP routing problems that cause your connection to take a longer path to the server. We can definitely take a look at your route, but first, we need to ensure your local network settings are good by having your connection compatible with our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if you notice any changes after completing that guide.
Actually, after an hour or two, my ping went back to normal! Thank you for your willingness to help though, it's reassuring to see that Riot does what they can to help their player base :)
